column4: Dear Friends, I found this screenshot! http://news.softpedia.com/newsImage/Ubuntu-8-04-Alpha-5-Available-Now-2.jpg Isit really what the next Ubuntu release is going to be lloking like ???
why not just go for the 9MB minimal iso? then you have almost nothing but x ;]
there is also the alternate cd that is text based (ncurses)
my graphics card is not supported out of the box
and I need to install a driver before starting x
depends on how light you want your system; some like the install only what you need effect--the alternate cd is nice for the graphically challenged live cd cards
I only cannot boot off it and the driver is not there
well try adding acpi=off to the boot parameters
what is it going to do?
any other effects of that parameter?
well you can reset it once you have the good drivers; nothing to worry about short term
know I can do apt-get install, than run: startx . How do I turn acpi on ??? Will I need to?
you can do so once the drivers are installed by removing the boot parameter
